Pre-Game Insights: Conor Bradley has revealed Northern Ireland still have their sights set on topping the group.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played in Hungary without fans in attendance due to Belarus' UEFA ban.
Others: The match will be available to watch on Viaplay International YouTube channel for free.
BBC Radio Ulster will provide radio coverage.
The odds for the match are: Belarus (7/2), Draw (11/5), Northern Ireland (9/10)
